target.expr: action:deployment_complete provider:$context environment:$environment stack:$stack service:$service | format "<service> r<release_num>" as _msg | fields _time, _msg
action:deployment_start provider:$context environment:$environment stack:$stack service:$service | format "<service> r<release_num>" as _msg | fields _time, _msg
action:deployment_complete provider:$context environment:$environment stack:$stack service:$service | format "<service> r<release_num>" as _msg | fields _time, _msg

description: Single-action deep dive with latency, errors, cache, payload, and DB query analysis

targets.expr: sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action", success="false"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by (action) (quantile_over_time(0.5, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by (action) (quantile_over_time(0.95, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (action) (count_over_time(cache_hit{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action", is_write="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (action) (count_over_time(cache_hit{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100
avg by (action) (avg_over_time(db_query_count{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(count_over_time(request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(count_over_time(request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action", success="false"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(quantile_over_time(0.5, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(quantile_over_time(0.95, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(quantile_over_time(0.99, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(quantile_over_time(0.5, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(quantile_over_time(0.95, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(quantile_over_time(0.99, request_duration_ms{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))

level:ERROR stack:$stack service:$service action:$action provider:$context environment:$environment error_source:* | extract "<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<es_stack>:<es_service>:<_>" from error_source | format "<es_stack>:<es_service>" as source | stats by(source) count() as errors | format "<source> (<errors>)" as source | format "$action" as action | stats by(source, action) sum(errors) as errors
level:ERROR stack:$stack service:$service action:$action provider:$context environment:$environment | stats by(_time:5m, error_type) count() as errors

level:ERROR stack:$stack service:$service action:$action provider:$context environment:$environment | extract "<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<_>:<es_stack>:<es_service>:<_>" from error_source | format "<es_stack>:<es_service>" as source | stats by(error_message, source) count() as count | sort by (count) desc | limit 20
sum(sum_over_time(cache_hit{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action", is_write="false"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(avg_over_time(db_query_count{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(avg_over_time(request_size_bytes{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg(avg_over_time(response_size_bytes{provider="$context", environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action="$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
level:ERROR error_source:* stack:$stack service:$service action:$action provider:$context environment:$environment | stats by(_time:5m, error_source) count() as errors
(action:deployment_start OR action:deployment_complete) stack:$stack service:$service provider:$context environment:$environment | sort by (_time desc) | limit 50

title: Action Detail
